files.title: Overview
files.summary: All the memory instructions take an address operand that specifies the memory location being accessed. This addressable operand is one of:

files.title: 6.4.1.1. Generic Addressing
files.summary: If a memory instruction does not specify a state space, the operation is performed using generic addressing. The state spaces `.const`, [Kernel Function Parameters](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#kernel-function-parameters) (`.param`), `.local` and `.shared` are modeled a...
